title.narrative: Brazil - Rio de Janeiro Renovating and Strengthening Public Management

description.narrative: The objective of the project is to support the State of Rio de Janeiro to introduce performance-based management and information technologies to drive service delivery improvements in key public services, including secondary education and hospital care.

condition.narrative: Finance Agreement :Schedule 3, Section I, A.3 | Description :Mantain regular meetings between SEPAG, SEEDUC and SESDEC to conveneat least once every quarter; prepare and furnish a copy of the minutes of each said meetings | Frequency :Quarterly
Finance Agreement :Schedule 3, Section I, A.4 | Description :Prepare and furnish the Annual Operating Plan -- at least once a year,on or about December 1 | Frequency :Yearly

Finance Agreement :Schedule 3, Section II, A.1 | Description :Prepare Project Reports, covering one calendar semester, and submitit no later than one month after the end of the period covered by such report | Frequency :Yearly
